snippet: A few weeks since, three men number W.R. ROBIN SON alias WM. B. HEPPARD, (a native of this city,) JOHN THOMPSON and -- GIBSON, notorious scoundrels, were tried on various have charges, before a regular court at Sacramento City, convicted and sente...
lead_paragraph: A few weeks since, three men number W.R. ROBIN SON alias WM. B. HEPPARD, (a native of this city,) JOHN THOMPSON and -- GIBSON, notorious scoundrels, were tried on various have charges, before a regular court at Sacramento City, convicted and sentenced to be hung on the 30th ult.

headline.main: Execution of three Men at Sacramento
